missions.title: Welcome
missions.description:
# Welcome to Amazon!  

**Congratulations** on joining the team! We’re thrilled to have you. Please review the [Company Handbook](https://example.com/handbook) and familiarize yourself with our core values:

- **Customer Obsession**
- **Invent and Simplify**
- **Deliver Results**

<u>Tip:</u> Reach out to your manager if you have any questions.

missions.title: Team Overview
missions.description:
## Your Team  

Meet the talented members of your squad:

- **Alice Johnson** – Engineering Manager  
- **Bob Lee** – Senior Software Engineer  
- **Carla Reyes** – Product Designer  

*Fun fact:* Our team loves hackathons! Check out last year’s recap [here](https://example.com/hackathon).

missions.title: Meet Your Onboarding Buddy
missions.description:
Your buddy is **Hashem Altabbaa**, a Developer in your team.  

Feel free to:

- **Book a chat** with them: [Schedule here](https://calendly.com/hashem)  
- Ask about day‑to‑day workflows  
- Learn about the codebase architecture  

<u>Tip:</u>: Hashem is a coffee enthusiast!_

missions.title: Standing Meeting: Welcome Onboard
missions.description:
### Daily Standup  

**Time:** *9:00 AM - 9:15 AM* in **Conference Room B**  

**Agenda:**
1. Quick introductions
2. Share your first impressions
3. Outline your first‑week goals

> _Reminder:_ Please be on time to make the most of everyone’s day.
